item.title: EA Access - Play Mirror's Edge Catalyst First on June 2
item.description:
EA Access - Play Mirror's Edge Catalyst First on June 2

Claim Your Freedom and play Mirror's Edge Catalyst before it's out with EA Access on Xbox One, starting June 2. http://x.ea.com/5753 Take control of Faith and build momentum to do daring jumps between rooftops or stylish slides through tight spaces.

item.title: Hard Reset Redux - Xbox One Launch Trailer
item.description:
Hard Reset Redux - Xbox One Launch Trailer

The walls of the last city have been breached. The machines, threatening to bring about the total extinction of the human race, are inches away from wiping out what's left of the population. Can you defend the city of Bezoar, and in it, an inestimable network containing billions of digitized human minds?

item.title: Blackwood Crossing Announcement Teaser
item.description:
Blackwood Crossing Announcement Teaser

Blackwood Crossing is a story-driven first-person adventure game, launching on Xbox One later this year. It's an intriguing, mysterious tale that explores the fragile relationship between orphaned siblings, Scarlett and Finn. When their paths cross with a mysterious figure, an ordinary train ride evolves into a magical story of life, love and loss.

item.title: GTA Online: Further Adventures in Finance and Felony (Official Trailer)
item.description:
GTA Online: Further Adventures in Finance and Felony (Official Trailer)

Ever since you first stepped off that flight to Los Santos, it's been all about rising up the criminal ranks, accruing wealth in your Maze Bank account, building a reputation, and taking no mess along the way... Now, realize your goal to become the ultimate kingpin of Los Santos and Blaine County.

item.title: The Staycation Will Be Televised With Dead Island: Definitive Collection
item.description:
The Staycation Will Be Televised With Dead Island: Definitive Collection

Polish developer Techland's Dead Island series, the definitive "worst vacation ever" simulator, now has a definitive edition, in the form of Dead Island: Definitive Collection. Available now, the collection includes both Dead Island and its sequel Dead Island: Riptide, along with Dead Island: Retro Revenge.

item.title: Xbox One gets price cut ahead of E3 2016
item.description:
Xbox One gets price cut ahead of E3 2016

Microsoft has dropped the price of its Xbox One by $50, a few days before E3 2016, where the company is expected to unveil an updated console.

item.title: This Week's Deals With Gold And Spotlight Sale
item.description:
This Week's Deals With Gold And Spotlight Sale

Here are this week's games and add-on deals on the Xbox Games Store. Discounts are valid now through 06 June 2016.

item.title: Mirror's Edge Catalyst Launch Trailer - Why We Run
item.description:
Mirror's Edge Catalyst Launch Trailer - Why We Run

Times are about to change in the city of Glass. Barely out of juvenile detention, skilled Runner Faith Connors stirs things up with the city's Conglomerate and the evil Gabriel Kruger. Faith is forced to start running for something far more important than herself.

item.title: Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare 2 | Trouble in Zombopolis Trailer
item.description:
Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare 2 | Trouble in Zombopolis Trailer

There's big trouble brewing in Plants vs. Zombie Garden Warfare 2! The new update Trouble in Zombopolis: Part One is free for all to play on Xbox One. It introduces a massive new map, two brand new exciting characters and over 1,200 new character customization items for even bigger fun.

item.title: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands Trailer - We Are Ghosts [US]
item.description:
Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands Trailer - We Are Ghosts [US]

Watch Ghost Recon Wildlands' brand-new trailer and see how the Ghosts decide to take on a massive and dangerous open world. Stay tuned for more at E3 2016. ABOUT GHOST RECON WILDLANDS: The Santa Blanca drug cartel has transformed the beautiful South American country of Bolivia into a perilous narco-state, leading to lawlessness, fear, and rampant violence.
